body: @Feitan777 Things only get weirder; despite looking like a child, Cagliostro is actually old as hell(and also a male soul, inserted into a little girl body, so technically an old man got pregnant o_O), and Charlotta at the end is 24, but her race does not grow past that size, so she looks like a child. The author was really going for a mindfuck making them pregnant in the same book. xD
@LivingDoll i eat normies for breakfast tho . was even your point anyways ? cause i was fuckin sarcastic you dumb fuck
